entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
